Description: Rim sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of faded rosette in added white outline with added red centres; exterior: frieze of reversed S between narrow bands at rim; below, painted decoration consisting of sphinx (top of head with hair and curlicue and top of wing remaining), to left.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1046) (phase 2)
